self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa

sentences.english: Eg: The heroes made an instant decision to risk their own lives to save others.
sentences.chinese: 英雄们立刻做出了舍己救人的决定。

sentences.english: I do not think Edith knows what self-denial is.
sentences.chinese: 我不认为伊迪丝知道什么是舍己。

sentences.english: There are two reasons for such a sacrifice.
The selfish person must grow in self-denial before people will trust.
sentences.chinese: 自私的人必须学会舍己，别人才会信任。

sentences.english: Dear Father, we are awed by your great wisdom and by our Savior's sacrificial love.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的父，我们惊叹祢无比的智慧和救主舍己的大爱。

sentences.english: True love is willing to sacrifice oneself.
sentences.chinese: 爱以至舍己才是真正的爱。

sentences.english: Christ loved the church and gave his life for it.
sentences.chinese: 正如基督爱教会，为教会舍己。

sentences.english: The selfish person must grow in self-denial before God will say " Go".
sentences.chinese: 自私的人必须学会舍己，上帝才会使用他。
